html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-05232023-06-01LAB
ActBudget Implementation Act, 2018, No. 2
SubjectOrder Fixing February 1, 2024 as the Day on Which Certain Sections of the Budget Implementation Act, 2018, No. 2 Come into Force
PrecisOrder fixing February 1, 2024 as the day on which sections 483, 485, and 522 of the BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2018, NO. 2 COME INTO FORCE in order to establish a graduated notice of individual termination of employment for employees in federally regulated workplaces based on their length of continuous employment.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Fixing February 1, 2024 as the Day on Which Certain Sections of the Budget Implementation Act, 2018, No. 2 Come into Force
precis: Order fixing February 1, 2024  as the day on which sections 483, 485, and 522 of the BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2018, NO. 2 COME INTO FORCE in order to establish a graduated notice of individual termination of employment for employees in federally regulated workplaces based on their length of continuous employment.
